recipe.title: Grilled Peaches with Pecorino and Prosciutto
ingredients: 4 firm but ripe large peaches, halved, pitted
8 very thin slices pecorino cheese (each about 2x2 inches, shaved with vegetable peeler from large wedge)
instructions: Spray grill rack with nonstick spray; prepare barbecue (high heat). Brush peach halves with oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill peaches until lightly charred, about 2 minutes per side. Place on large plate, skin side down; top each with cheese slice and drape with prosciutto. Serve immediately.
